Issue.creator: mathiasb303
Issue.summary: Add support for new v1.3 version handling in X.509 MSP
Issue.description: Add new v1.3 MSP version, for which SatisfiesPrincipal will be enhanced to handle the extended version of MSPPrincipal. Even though this feature is planned for v1.2, it will be hidden behind a v1.3 channel capability, which will not be introduced until v1.3. It will therefore not be possible to create a v1.3 MSP before that, and Anonymous and Combined Principals will not be recognized by v1.2 X.509 MSPs.
